name: Dr. Evazan & Ponda Baba
Lore: 'Smugglers who met each other in the Corellian system. Gained the rights to Han Solo''s old smuggling routes from Jabba the Hutt. They don''t like you either.',
Text: 'Adds 3 to power of anything they pilot. Power -3 if opponent has a lightsaber present. Draws one battle destiny if not able to otherwise. May target any other character present that was just ''hit.'' Target character is lost.',
